levels.description: Talent 1 effect increased to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale_display:0.0}</>x, ATK increased to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</>, and slashes all enemies in the frontal tile 16 times. <@ba.vdown>More likely to be targeted by attacks for the duration</>
